entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
